entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Grande Cache
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:49 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hendrickson Creek 12:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 late this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
